description: An emergency coronavirus law in the Isle of Man means arrivals must quarantine themselves for 14 days.
title: Coronavirus: No prosecution for man who 'failed to self-isolate'
title_page: Coronavirus: No prosecution for man who 'failed to self-isolate' - BBC News
maintext: Police said the man had been "detained for his safety and the safety of the public" and accommodation where he could self-isolate had now been found.
